Description: A short description of what the biotracker tool is used for. I.e. it helps detect enemies, and it can "tag" enemies. To "tag" an enemy is to mark them with a HUD icon so that everyone on the team can see the enemy, even in darkness or through walls.

French.Translation:
Détection des ennemis
Marquage des ennemis

Spanish.Translation:
Detección de enemigos
Rastro de enemigos

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation:
Detecção de inimigo
Marcação de inimigo

Japanese.Translation:
敵探知
敵タグ付け

Chinese_Traditional.Translation:
敵人偵測
敵人標記

Chinese_Simplified.Translation:
探测敌人
标记敌人

name: GearCategory.MotionTrackerDescription
